page.title: 18Religion in the Area
page.content: Most people in the Longhope, MayHill and Huntley area are at least nominally Christian .The C of E churches in the area are{All Saints', {Longhope,All Saints',MayHill and St. {John the Baptist,Huntley}.The parishes are now combined under one Rector who lives in the Rectory at Huntley.On MayHill there is a{Methodist}church which is part of the Gloucester Circuit of Methodist Churches. {Roman Catholics}in the area can attend services in the church at Salesian School, Blaisdon.{Baptists}can attend {Zion Baptist Church}on Hopes Hill whose buildings also form Hopes Hill County Primary School.Others may have to travel to Gloucester,Cinderford or Ross.
